```{r echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, comment = "##")

# Print HTML tags as HTML text
knit_print.shiny.tag <- function(x, ...) {
  as.character(x)
}

# Shrink .png file, and optionally rescale it
shrink <- function(filename, scale = NULL) {
  if (!is.null(scale)) {
    system2('convert', args = c(filename, '-scale', scale, filename))
  }
  system2('optipng', filename)  
}
```


## Skins

There are two color themes, or skins: blue and black. The default is blue. You can choose which theme to use with `shinyDashboard(skin="blue")` or `shinyDashboard(skin="black")`.

Blue:

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
webshot::appshot('_apps/dashboard/', 'images/skin-blue.png',
  delay=1, vheight=500, cliprect = "viewport"
)
shrink('images/skin-blue.png', scale = "75%")
#"
```

![Blue skin](images/skin-blue.png)

Black:

```{r eval=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
webshot::appshot('_apps/skin-black/', 'images/skin-black.png',
  delay=1, vheight=500, cliprect = "viewport"
)
shrink('images/skin-black.png', scale = "75%")
#"
```

![Black skin](images/skin-black.png)
